amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Economic Research Service by $50,000 offset by a $50,000 reduction in the Chief Economist account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in part B of House Report 111-191 to transfer $50,000 from the Chief Economist to the Economic Research Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brady (TX) amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 404 - 27 (Roll no. 499).
